index.heroSubtitle: Experience next-generation financial technology with multi-layer security, real-time protection, and privacy-first architecture. Your digital assets, completely secured.
index.featuresSubtitle: Empowering Croatia's innovation economy with advanced cryptographic protocols
index.feature1Desc: Military-grade AES-256 encryption with biometric authentication and cold storage integration.
index.feature2Desc: AI-powered threat detection monitoring 24/7 across global networks.
index.feature3Desc: Croatian privacy standards with zero-knowledge encryption.
index.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of Croatians who trust Pulse Wallet with their digital assets.

about.title: About Pulse Wallet
about.subtitle: Your trusted digital wallet for secure cryptocurrency management and staking
about.heroDescription: Pulse Wallet combines cutting-edge security with user-friendly design to provide you with a seamless cryptocurrency experience. Store, stake, and manage your digital assets with confidence.
about.stakingDescription: Earn passive income by staking your ETH with our secure and transparent staking program. No minimum requirements, instant start.
about.stakingFeature1Desc: Start with as little as 0.001 ETH
about.stakingFeature2Desc: Earn up to 5% APY paid daily
about.stakingFeature4Desc: Multi-layer security for your staked assets
about.howStakingWorksStep1: Stake your ETH with one click from your dashboard
about.howStakingWorksStep2: Watch your rewards grow daily and withdraw anytime
about.feature1Desc: Military-grade encryption protects your private keys and assets 24/7
about.feature2Desc: Process transactions in seconds with optimized blockchain connections
about.feature3Desc: Store BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC and more in one secure wallet
about.feature4Desc: Our team is always available to help with any questions
about.feature5Desc: Your privacy matters. We never share your personal data
about.feature6Desc: Track your portfolio performance with live price feeds
about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust Pulse Wallet for their digital asset management

toast.notificationsClearedDesc: All message notifications have been cleared.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.subtitle: Secure your account with an additional layer of protection using Google Authenticator or similar TOTP apps.
twoFactorAuth.recoveryKeyDesc: Your 12-character private key for password recovery
twoFactorAuth.warning1: This key can reset your password - keep it secure!
twoFactorAuth.warning2: Store it in a safe place (password manager, secure notes)
twoFactorAuth.warning3: Never share this key with anyone
twoFactorAuth.warning4: This key is shown only on this page
twoFactorAuth.howToUseDesc: If you forget your password, you can use this 12-character key along with your email address to reset your password on the login page.
twoFactorAuth.loadError: Failed to load private key. Please refresh the page.

bankDeposit.depositInstructionsDesc: Use the bank details below to make a deposit to your account. Your EUR balance will be updated once the deposit is confirmed.
bankDeposit.contactSupportDesc: Bank deposit details are not yet available for your account. Please contact our support team to set up your bank deposit details.
